word_mean: 〔复apophyses〕 〔NA〕骨突：任何过生或隆突，尤指完全未与构成它的骨组织分离的骨性突出物，如突起、结节或粗隆

PerfectNetExp.abs: apophyses apophysis的复数apophysis 岩枝apoporphyry 变斑岩
apophyllite 鱼眼石apophysis 隆起apoplectic 患中风者
aponeurosis 腱膜apophysis 骨凸apophyte 固有栽培植物
骨突环 (apophyseal ring): 在终板下方环绕椎体的一圈皮质骨。  骨突(apophysis): 骨面的突起,骨突或生长点没有独立的骨化中心。  蛛网膜 (arachnoid): 一.

list.abs: fracture 骨折fracture apophysial 骨突折断fracture by contrecoup 对冲骨折

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek apophusis 'offshoot', from apo- 'from, away' + phusis 'growth'

means.word_mean: 1. (botany) a natural swelling or enlargement: at the base of the stalk or seta in certain mosses or on the cone scale of certain conifers
2. (anatomy) a natural outgrowth or projection on an organ or part such as the process of a vertebra
